original_text: Thus Jehoshaphat reigned over Judah. He was thirty-five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned twenty-five years in Jerusalem. His mother's name was Azubah the daughter of Shilhi.
korean_text: 여호사밧이 유다의 왕이 되어 왕위에 오를 때에 나이가 삼십오 세라 예루살렘에서 이십오 년 동안 다스리니라 그의 어머니의 이름은 아수바라 실히의 딸이더라

sentences.original_text: He was thirty-five years old when he began to reign,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 통치를 시작할 때에 나이 삼십오 세였으며,

sentences.original_text: and he reigned twenty-five years in Jerusalem.
His mother's name was Azubah the daughter of Shilhi.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 어머니의 이름은 실히의 딸 아수바였다.
